text: Michelle Williams and Heath Ledger in 2006. Last week, Michelle Williams revealed in a profile for Vanity Fair ’ s September issue that she recently married musician Phil Elverum, of Mount Eerie, in a secret ceremony in the Adirondacks. And in an interview with Australia ’ s Sydney Morning Herald this weekend, Heath Ledger ’ s father, Kim, said he and his family are “ terribly happy ” for Williams. “ She ’ s very private and I don ’ t really like to make too many comments about her, but we are very happy [ for her ], ” Kim Ledger told the paper.
